attributes.action: give the fire fighters more money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: fire fighters go out everyday risking their lives to save others, yet they dont get paid enough money! yet you get footballers that run on a pitch to kick a ball around for ninety minutes to entertain fans.look at these four hereos that went into this warehouse and lost their lives trying to save someones life. all those fire fighters that saved all those people on 9/11 terroist attack who pulled all those people from the rubble, what did they get for that?? these firefighters deserve more than a low paid salary. if it wasnt for them many people in this world wouldnt be alive.
